misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko is a highly accomplished golfer whose dedication to the game is evident in his consistent participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée.  Hailing from Lakeside Golf Vammala, Mikko has become a familiar face at this annual invitational, having competed in each edition since 2022.

His commitment to excellence is undeniable, as he consistently challenges himself against some of the best players in the world. While Mikko has yet to claim the Hector Trophée itself, his dedication and skill make him a serious contender every year, a testament to his passion and enduring pursuit of victory.

Beyond his competitive spirit, Mikko is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. He is a respected figure within the golfing community, known for his sportsmanship and graciousness, both on and off the course. This makes him an exciting player to watch, adding a level of class and dignity to every tournament in which he participates.
